name: Entity
description: Entity is the base for all Classes, and all those entities share the same Methods and Events described in this page.

static_functions.name: GetAll
static_functions.description: Returns a table containing all Entities of the class this is called on

return.description: Copy of table containing all Entities

static_functions.name: GetByIndex
static_functions.description: Returns a specific Entity of this class at an index

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index of the Entity

static_functions.name: GetCount
static_functions.description: Returns how many Entities of this class exist

return.description: Number of Entities of this class

static_functions.name: GetPairs
static_functions.description: Returns an iterator with all Entities of this class to be used with pairs()
static_functions.description_long:
Returns an iterator with all Entities of this class to be used with pairs(). This is a more performant method than GetAll(), as it will return the iterator to access the Entities directly instead of creating and returning a copy of the Entities table.

Note: Destroying Entities from inside a GetPairs() loop will cause the iterable to change size during the process. If you want to loop-and-destroy, please use GetAll().

return.description: Iterator with all Entities of this class

static_functions.name: Inherit
static_functions.description: Inherits this class with the Inheriting System

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new Class

parameters.name: custom_values
parameters.description: An optional table with custom values to be set in the inherited class table

static_functions.name: GetInheritedClasses
static_functions.description: Gets a list of all directly inherited classes from this Class created with the Inheriting System

parameters.name: recursively
parameters.description: Returns all inherited children

static_functions.name: GetParentClass
static_functions.description: Gets the parent class if this Class was created with the Inheriting System

static_functions.name: IsChildOf
static_functions.description: Gets if this Class is child of another class if this Class was created with the Inheriting System

parameters.name: class
parameters.description: The other class to check

static_functions.name: Subscribe
static_functions.description: Subscribes to an Event for all entities of this Class

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: Name of the event to subscribe to

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function to call when the event is triggered

return.description: Callback that was passed (useful for unsubscribing later if your callback is an anonymous function)

static_functions.name: SubscribeRemote
static_functions.description: Subscribes to a custom event called from server

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: Name of the event to subscribe to

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function to call when the event is triggered

return.description: Callback that was passed (useful for unsubscribing later if your callback is an anonymous function)

static_functions.name: Unsubscribe
static_functions.description: Unsubscribes all callbacks from this Event in this Class within this Package, or only the callback passed

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: Name of the event to unsubscribe from

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Optional callback to unsubscribe

functions.name: GetID
functions.description: Gets the universal network ID of this Entity (same on both client and server)

functions.name: GetClass
functions.description: Gets the class of this entity

functions.name: IsA
functions.description: Recursively checks if this entity is inherited from a Class

parameters.name: class
parameters.description: The Class

functions.name: Subscribe
functions.description: Subscribes to an Event on this specific entity

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: Name of the event to subscribe to

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function to call when the event is triggered

return.description: Callback that was passed (useful for unsubscribing later if your callback is an anonymous function)

functions.name: SubscribeRemote
functions.description: Subscribes to a custom event called from server on this specific entity

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: Name of the event to subscribe to

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function to call when the event is triggered

return.description: Callback that was passed (useful for unsubscribing later if your callback is an anonymous function)

functions.name: Unsubscribe
functions.description: Unsubscribes all callbacks from this Event in this Entity within this Package, or only the callback passed

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: Name of the event to unsubscribe from

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Optional callback to unsubscribe

functions.name: SetValue
functions.description_long:
Sets a value in this Entity, which can be accessed by any package (optionally sync on clients if called from server)

Please refer to Entity Values for more information

parameters.name: sync_on_clients
parameters.description: Server side parameter, if enabled will sync this value with all clients

functions.name: GetValue
functions.description: Gets a Value stored on this Entity at the given key
functions.description_long: Gets a Value stored on this Entity at the given key. Please refer to Entity Values for more information

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Fallback value if key doesn't exist

return.description: Value at key or fallback if key doesn't exist
return.name: value

functions.name: GetAllValuesKeys
functions.description: Gets a list of all values keys

return.description: a list with all values keys

functions.name: IsValid
functions.description: Returns true if this Entity is valid (i.e. wasn't destroyed and points to a valid Entity)

functions.name: CallRemoteEvent
functions.description: Calls a custom remote event directly on this entity to a specific Player

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to trigger the event

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The remote player to send this event

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Arguments to pass to the event

functions.name: CallRemoteEvent
functions.description: Calls a custom remote event directly on this entity

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to trigger the event

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Arguments to pass to the event

functions.name: BroadcastRemoteEvent
functions.description: Calls a custom remote event directly on this entity to all Players

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to trigger the event

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Arguments to pass to the event

events.name: Spawn
events.description: Triggered when an Entity is spawned/created

events.name: Destroy
events.description: Triggered when an Entity is destroyed

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: The Entity which that was destroyed

events.name: ValueChange
events.description: Triggered when an Entity has a value changed with :SetValue()

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: The Entity that just had a value changed

events.name: ClassRegister
events.description: Triggered when a new Class is registered with the Inheriting System
